if it's about feels, Tokyo Godfathers... Either I'm a soukess bastard or just desensitized to feels.

And Digimon Frontier is not bad but had the misfortune to come out after Taners which (for audiences at least and as always YMM ) set the bar to high for the next season

And still nothing on Tri for that matter

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552d50bc6368725b6d824500#post_552d50bc6368725b6d824500
Fuck that noise, I'm not dealing with France directly.

They're already a cancer in the standard EU4 world. They just became even more-so in this CK2 conversion. They're well known to be the unstoppable blob. But not they're the impenetrable blob. I ain't got the army limit or manpower to throw down with the French.

So why do that when I got all of Asia being pussy and behind on tech to turn into my playground?
